Dungeon Events.description: Encounter: Roll on an encounter table. Possibly hostile. (See Reactions.)
Sign: A clue, spoor, track, abandoned lair, scent, victim, etc is discovered.
Environment: Surroundings shift or escalate. Water rises, ceilings collapse, a ritual nears completion, etc.
Loss: Torches are blown out, an ongoing spell fizzles, etc. The party must resolve the effect before moving on.
Exhaustion: The party must rest (triggering another roll on this table), add a Fatigue, or consume a ration.
Discovery: The party is left alone (and safe) for the time being.
